name: SparkFun KiCad Libraries
description_full:
This library contains SparkFun's commonly used parts.
It is a cultivated combination of KiCad stock parts, SparkFun-unique footprints, and open-source 3D models.

Check your settings in Preferences -> Packages and Updates.
If you have the default Library nickname prefix 'PCM_', you can proceed to install the libraries through the PCM.
If you don't want that prefix, leave that field blank and install the libraries from zip file instead.
The installation link below has more details.
